testcase.failure: [chromium] › mobile.spec.ts:6:3 › Mobile Experience › should have responsive navigation menu ───── Error: expect.toBeVisible: Error: strict mode violation: locator('nav a:has-text("Tours")') resolved to 3 elements: 1) … aka locator('#main-header').getByText('Tours', { exact: true }) 2) ↵View Tours↵ aka getByText('View Tours') 3) … aka getByRole('link', { name: 'Tours', exact: true }) Call log: - Expect "toBeVisible" with timeout 5000ms - waiting for locator('nav a:has-text("Tours")') 15 | 16 | // Navigation links should be visible > 17 | await expect(page.locator('nav a:has-text("Tours")')).toBeVisible() | ^ 18 | await expect(page.locator('nav a:has-text("About")')).toBeVisible() 19 | await expect(page.locator('nav a:has-text("Contact")')).toBeVisible() 20 | }) at /Users/mbp-ez/Desktop/AI Library/Apps/AV Tours EZ/tests/e2e/mobile.spec.ts:17:59 attachment #1: screenshot (image/png) ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── ../../test-results/mobile-Mobile-Experience-s-f6c69--responsive-navigation-menu-chromium/test-failed-1.png ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── attachment #2: video (video/webm) ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── ../../test-results/mobile-Mobile-Experience-s-f6c69--responsive-navigation-menu-chromium/video.webm ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── Error Context: ../../test-results/mobile-Mobile-Experience-s-f6c69--responsive-navigation-menu-chromium/error-context.md
